org.javautil.commandline
Class CommandLineHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.javautil.commandline.CommandLineHandler

public class CommandLineHandler
extends Object

A class that facilitates the declarative definition of program arguments using java annotations. Steps:

  • Write an annotated Argument Bean
  • Create one or more resource files (base and then language specific) to describe the arguments
Annotations TODO RequiredUnless Annotation that references a non existent field does not throw an error unless the argument is specified
